alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Southern Saratoga; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 03 at 6:48PM EST until February 04 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...The Capital District in eastern New York. * WHEN...Until noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills can cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lowest wind chills are expected tonight into early Saturday morning. Wind gusts between 35 and 50 miles per hour will continue this evening, which could result in downed limbs and trees and isolated power outages. Winds will ease Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Albany; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Southern Saratoga; Western Rensselaer
